title: [Large-scale] Technology-supported Construction Engineering and Management Project-based Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Engineering Concepts and General Familiarity with Construction Industry Processes
context.additional_context: Learners use personal devices (BYOD) to perform projects utilizing digital collaboration tools and simulation software

learning_goals: Learners successfully plan and execute three or more project scenarios within six months using construction project scheduling tools
Learners cultivate the ability to perform 3D modeling and analysis of construction structures using BIM (Building Information Modeling) software
Learners improve real-time data sharing and decision-making processes with team members via collaborative platforms by over 80% efficiency
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
